statements: SELECT * FROM employee_compliance_training ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, training_module FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT training_module FROM employee_compliance_training;
SELECT employee_name, completion_date FROM employee_compliance_training ORDER BY completion_date ASC, employee_name;
SELECT * FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT employee_name, training_module, completion_date FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name FROM employee_compliance_training ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, training_module FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE training_module LIKE '%Safety%';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_compliance_training WHERE completion_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_info
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_completed = TRUE
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_info ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT * FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_completed = true;
SELECT employee_id, training_date FROM compliance_training_records WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_info ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM employee_info;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employee_info WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_records WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, training_date FROM employees JOIN training_records ON employees.employee_id = training_records.employee_id WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employees.employee_name, compliance_requirements.requirement_name FROM employees JOIN compliance_requirements ON employees.employee_id = compliance_requirements.requirement_id;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM training_records WHERE training_date < '2022-06-30');
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT program_name, completion_due_date FROM TrainingPrograms ORDER BY completion_due_date DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_path FROM ComplianceDocuments WHERE document_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.program_name FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN TrainingPrograms t ON et.program_id = t.program_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, completion_due_date FROM TrainingPrograms WHERE completion_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.program_name FROM Employees e INNER JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id INNER JOIN TrainingPrograms t ON r.program_id = t.program_id;
SELECT d.document_name, d.document_description, e.first_name, e.last_name FROM ComplianceDocuments d LEFT JOIN Employees e ON d.document_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, course_id, completion_date FROM employee_training_records ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM training_courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT manager_name, department_name FROM managers JOIN departments ON managers.manager_id = departments.manager_id;
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC, name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, email, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND hire_date >= '2021-01-01'

SELECT e.name, e.email, c.course_name, c.course_duration FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_training_records etr ON e.id = etr.employee_id INNER JOIN training_courses c ON etr.course_id = c.course_id WHERE etr.grade >= 80

SELECT e.name AS employee_name, d.department_name AS department, m.manager_name AS manager FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name INNER JOIN managers m ON d.manager_id = m.manager_id

SELECT e.name, e.email, count(etr.course_id) AS courses_completed FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_training_records etr ON e.id = etr.employee_id GROUP BY e.id HAVING courses_completed >= 3 ORDER BY courses_completed DESC
